name: Beat Block
description:
NOTE: Avoid clicking off the game screen when shooting. Player movement will lock and you will need to refresh the game!

Controls:

Use ‘A’ and ‘D’ to move left and right

Use ‘W’ to dash

Use ‘Space’ to  jump and wall jump

Hold down ‘LMB’ to shoot at either direction of the player

Press ‘B’ to enter Build Mode and click the ‘LMB’ to place a turret

Press ‘B’ again to exit Build Mode
